chapter.1.title: hidden
chapter.2.quest.1.subtitle:
Welcome to DawnCraft.

This modpack uses its custom quest system instead of the traditional FTBQuest system.

This book's only function is for you to keep track of which bosses you still have to defeat to 100% this modpack.
